stories.definitionOfDone: • Satellite Communication: The system establishes a stable, two-way communication link with at least 90% of the target weather stations via satellite within the first week of deployment.
stories.description: The system must communicate with weather stations via satellite to monitor system health and provide reports of problems so that station maintenance can be performed efficiently.
stories.testCases:
Test: Verify that the system must communicate with weather stations via satellite to monitor system health and provide reports of problems
Expected: Functionality works as specified in the user story
stories.title: Communicate Weather Stations Via Satellite

stories.definitionOfDone: • Local Processing: The local processing component successfully aggregates data from various sources within a 1-second latency threshold, with an accuracy rate of at least 99.9%.
stories.description: The system must perform local processing and aggregation of the data before transmitting it when requested by the data collection system so that data can be transmitted reliably.
stories.testCases:
Test: Verify that the system must perform local processing and aggregation of the data before transmitting it when requested by the data collection system
Expected: Functionality works as specified in the user story
stories.title: Perform Local Processing Aggregation Of

stories.definitionOfDone: • Data Storage: The system stores data in a reliable local storage solution, such as a database or file system, that can withstand power failures and network disconnections.
stories.description: The system must maintain the data locally until communication can be resumed if a connection is lost so that data is not lost in case of failure.
stories.testCases:
Test: Verify that the system must maintain the data locally until communication can be resumed if a connection is lost
Expected: Functionality works as specified in the user story
stories.title: Maintain Data Locally Until Communication

stories.definitionOfDone: • Power Management: System power management is implemented with a dynamic reconfiguration mechanism that can adjust to changing weather conditions and battery charging needs. The system ensures batteries are charged when possible, but shuts down generators in potentially damaging weather conditions.
stories.description: The system must ensure batteries are charged when possible but shuts down generators in potentially damaging weather conditions so that the station remains operational.
stories.testCases:
Test: Verify that the system must ensure batteries are charged when possible but shuts down generators in potentially damaging weather conditions
Expected: Functionality works as specified in the user story
stories.title: Ensure Batteries Are Charged When

stories.definitionOfDone: • Software Updates: The update process is automated, includes version control tracking, and can be rolled back in case of issues. The updated software is thoroughly tested for compatibility and functionality.
stories.description: The system must update embedded software in these systems and remotely control a weather station in case of system issues so that the system can be maintained effectively.
stories.testCases:
Test: Verify that the system must update embedded software in these systems and remotely control a weather station in case of system issues
Expected: Functionality works as specified in the user story
stories.title: Update Embedded Software These Systems

stories.definitionOfDone: • Data Analysis: The data analysis results are accurate, reliable, and presented in a clear and concise manner, including visualizations and key findings.
stories.description: The system must carry out data processing and analysis, and archive the data in a retrievable format for other systems, such as weather forecasting systems so that accurate forecasts can be made.
stories.testCases:
Test: Verify that the system must carry out data processing and analysis, and archive the data in a retrievable format for other systems, such as weather forecasting systems
Expected: Functionality works as specified in the user story
stories.title: Carry Out Data Processing Analysis

stories.definitionOfDone:
• Data Collection: Weather data is collected from all sources (sensors, satellites, etc.) and stored in a centralized database with a minimum of 95% accuracy rate.
• Initial Data Processing: Data is processed to remove duplicates, correct errors, and perform initial calculations for forecasting models with an error rate below 5%
• Transmission To Data Management System: Weather data is transmitted to the data management system in real-time, with a latency of less than 10 minutes
stories.description: The system must collect weather data, perform initial data processing, and transmit it to the data management system so that accurate forecasts can be made.
